sentences.en: a rare variety of orchid
sentences.cn: 兰花的稀有品种

sentences.en: A variety of heavy industries grew up alongside the port.
sentences.cn: 各种重工业沿着港口逐渐发展起来。

sentences.en: A wide variety of hot and cold snacks will be available.
sentences.cn: 会有各种冷热小吃。

sentences.en: Eat a wide variety of carbs, fruit, and vegetables.
sentences.cn: 食用多种碳水化合物食物、水果和蔬菜。

sentences.en: He can perform an astonishing variety of acts, including mime and juggling.
sentences.cn: 他能表演好几种令人惊叹的把戏，包括哑剧和玩杂耍。

sentences.en: I really like the variety the store has to offer.
sentences.cn: 我很喜欢这家商店商品的丰富多样。

sentences.en: I'm always pleased to try out a new variety.
sentences.cn: 我一直乐于尝试新产品。

sentences.en: People change their mind for a variety of reasons.
sentences.cn: 人们会由于种种原因改变主意。

sentences.en: She produces elegant wedding gowns in a variety of sumptuous fabrics.
sentences.cn: 她用各种华贵的布料制作高雅的婚纱。

sentences.en: She was no mean performer on a variety of other instruments.
sentences.cn: 许多别的乐器她也演奏得相当出色。

sentences.en: Some shoppers looked bewildered by the sheer variety of goods on offer.
sentences.cn: 光是摆在那里的各式商品就让一些购物者晕头转向了。

sentences.en: Susan's idea of freedom was to have variety in her life style.
sentences.cn: 苏珊心目中的自由就是拥有丰富多彩的生活。

sentences.en: The Bush Foundation has funded a variety of faculty development programs.
sentences.cn: 布什基金会已经资助了许多教员发展项目。

sentences.en: The girls come from a variety of different backgrounds.
sentences.cn: 这些女孩出身背景各不相同。

sentences.en: The island offers such a wide variety of scenery and wildlife.
sentences.cn: 这个岛屿拥有丰富多样的景致及种类繁多的野生动植物。

sentences.en: The lake has more than 20 varieties of fish.
sentences.cn: 那个湖里有二十多种鱼。

sentences.en: The most amazing thing about nature is its infinite variety.
sentences.cn: 大自然最让人惊叹的是它的无限多样性。

sentences.en: West Hampstead has a variety of good shops and supermarkets.
sentences.cn: 西汉普斯特德有各种各样不错的店铺和超级市场。

sentences.en: West Hampstead has a variety of good stores and supermarkets.
sentences.cn: 西汉普斯特德有几家不同的高品质商店和超市。

sentences.en: You will find a wide variety of choices available in school cafeterias.
sentences.cn: 在学校的自助餐厅里你会发现有很多饮食可供选择。

words.tran_cn: 多变的；各式各样的；杂色的
改变；使多样化（vary的过去式和过去分词形式）
使多样化，使丰富多彩；使成杂色
不同,差异,相反,矛盾,不一致,变化,多样

phrases.tran_cn: 货品种类，产品种类；产品多样化；积簇

phrases.phrase: variety is the spice of life

trans.tran_cn: 多种多样，多样化，种类，综艺节目
trans.tran_en: the differences within a group, set of actions etc that make it interesting
